oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The class of nonlinear dynamical systems obtained by interconnection of a linear, time-invariant dynamical system and a memoryless, time-invariant, sector-bound nonlinearity has been widely studied in literature. In this paper it is shown that many important results for this class of systems can be elegantly unified using behavioral theory of dynamical systems. Systems with slope-restricted nonlinearities are also considered. (C) 2007
